column4: so, anyone, i just restarted my powerbook holding option and the dapper live disc was not a boot option. any ideas? i cant find anything online
you gotta hold down c right as you turn the thing on
you sure the disk is bootable?

im pretty sure i downloaed the right [read: bootable]  version, and monofonik, im almost certain i got the ppc. do either of you know, definitively, the proper link to get the right iso? and further, how to 100% make sure the disk is bootable?
